errors.configurationBuildException: The import configuration could not be created from the uploaded files.
errors.exportException: An unexpected error occurred while exporting.
errors.importException: An unexpected error occurred while importing.
errors.invalidContentType: The file "{0}" is not of type "application / json".
errors.invalidJsonArrayFile: The file "{0}" contains a json-array and is not supported.
errors.invalidJsonFile: The file "{0}" is an invalid json-file.

importForm.files-required: The field "{0}" is required. Only json-files are supported.
importForm.deleteAllOthers-Description: Deletes all other data that is not included in the imported files.
importForm.verifyOnly-Description: Verify only what the result of the import will be. The import is not saved to the database.

exportForm.name-required: At least one type must be selected.
exportForm.types-description: Select the types you want to export.

index.heading: Current data
index.information: Information about the current data in the database. The list shows the number of entries of each type.

no-existing-data.heading: Tables missing
no-existing-data.information: There are no tables in the database.
